summary: Three angels bestow the gift of song to a young girl, who must follow a series of rules in order hold on to it during her rise to fame and fortune.
cast: Michael McKean|Bronson Pinchot|Cheech Marin|Jackie Welch|Kaitlyn Dorff|Katrina Elam|Adam Skaggs|Travis Fimmel|Jeff Obafemi Carr|David Chattam|Heidi Brook Myers|Luther Lewis|Se Oh|Joey Vito|Michael Yama|Ryan Cheng|Jerry Navarro|Todd Truley|Paige Rasmussen|Larry Black|Chris Strand|Ed Hawes|Steve Elvis|Tom Seyfried|Dean Cain|Krisinda Cain|Jeremy Childs|William Katt|George Strait|Jeff Schafer|Sharon Thomas Cain|Benjamin Reed|James DeForest Parker|Woody Woodruff|Maurice Scott|Billy Swayze|Bill Shick|Yun Blair|Brett Taylor|Steve Alberts|Drew Hanson|Stacy Harris|Jason Hees|Denise Johnson|Joshua James Johnson|Asia Kaleem|Wendy Keeling|Leo Kling|Melissa Nyenhuis|Jon Douglas Rainey|Shilo Slider Turri|William Smith|James Stokes|Sean Symons
title: Camino a la fama
